title: Beta Client Froze
body: I was in a ranked champion select, and it beta client just froze and won't work until i missed my pick (i have a mac). Legacy client  works fine. Does it freeze because my computer can't handle the graphics? And how do i uninstall beta client?

replies.body:
It depends on your system specs, but we have seen some performance issues with the Beta Client when it's been used on lower-spec computers.

In order to uninstall the Beta client cleanly, you'll have to complete a *clean reinstallation* of League using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac). Let me know if you have any questions.
